body:
## :star: New Features

- UUID identifiers for event publications don't work on H2 2.x [#237](https://github.com/moduliths/moduliths/issues/237)
- Improve auto-configuration arrangement for Boot [#235](https://github.com/moduliths/moduliths/issues/235)

## :hammer: Dependency Upgrades

- Upgrade to jMolecules 2021.2.4 [#240](https://github.com/moduliths/moduliths/issues/240)
- Upgrade to Spring Boot 2.6.8 [#239](https://github.com/moduliths/moduliths/issues/239), [#238](https://github.com/moduliths/moduliths/issues/238)

name: 1.3 RC1
body:
## :star: New Features

- Add starter modules for easier consumption of Moduliths [#229](https://github.com/moduliths/moduliths/issues/229)
- Introduce Jakarta EE flavor for the JPA-based event publication registry [#228](https://github.com/moduliths/moduliths/issues/228)
- Re-implement JPA-based event publication registry to work without Spring Data [#223](https://github.com/moduliths/moduliths/issues/223)
- Add Passage of Time events implementation [#215](https://github.com/moduliths/moduliths/issues/215)
- Allow tweaking the default output directory for documentation generation [#212](https://github.com/moduliths/moduliths/issues/212)

## :beetle: Bug Fixes

- Invalid reference to JMolecules ArchUnit rules [#219](https://github.com/moduliths/moduliths/issues/219)

## :hammer: Dependency Upgrades

- Upgrade to jMolecules BOM 2021.2.3 [#233](https://github.com/moduliths/moduliths/issues/233)
- Upgrade to Spring Boot 2.6.6 [#232](https://github.com/moduliths/moduliths/issues/232), [#225](https://github.com/moduliths/moduliths/issues/225), [#211](https://github.com/moduliths/moduliths/issues/211)
- Upgrade JPA Jakarta event registry implementation to Hibernate 6 CR2 [#230](https://github.com/moduliths/moduliths/issues/230)
- Upgrade to ArchUnit 0.23.1 [#224](https://github.com/moduliths/moduliths/issues/224), [#220](https://github.com/moduliths/moduliths/issues/220)

## :hammer: Dependency Upgrades

- Upgrade to Spring Boot 2.5.12 [#231](https://github.com/moduliths/moduliths/issues/231)

## :beetle: Bug Fixes

- Incomplete transactional events not being invoked after restarting application [#201](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/201)

## :hammer: Dependency Upgrades

- Upgrade to Spring Boot 2.5.9 [#213](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/213)

name: 1.3 M2
body:
M2 had to be released hot on the heels of M1 as the latter contained a few serious glitches that made it barely usable. So, for a quick overview, the new features shipped with M1 have been folded into the news list here:

## :star: New Features

- Support for runtime observability [#205](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/205)
- Module canvas should document exposed configuration properties [#194](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/194)
- Allow to keep components without relationships in component diagrams [#203](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/203)
- Module entry logging should be in trace level to avoid logging overhead [#209](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/209)

## :lady_beetle: Bug Fixes

- Observability autoconfiguration does not bootstrap properly [#208](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/208)
- User type for class-based proxy instances not calculated correctly [#207](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/207)

## :hammer: Dependency Upgrades

- Upgrade to ArchUnit 0.22 [#200](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/200)
- Upgrade to Spring Boot 2.6 [#199](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/199)

name: 1.3 M1
body:
## :star: New Features

- Support for runtime observability [#205](https://github.com/moduliths/moduliths/issues/205)
- Module canvas should document exposed configuration properties [#194](https://github.com/moduliths/moduliths/issues/194)

## :notebook_with_decorative_cover: Documentation

- Allow to keep components without relationships in component diagrams [#203](https://github.com/moduliths/moduliths/issues/203)

## :hammer: Dependency Upgrades

- Upgrade to ArchUnit 0.22 [#200](https://github.com/moduliths/moduliths/issues/200)
- Upgrade to Spring Boot 2.6 [#199](https://github.com/moduliths/moduliths/issues/199)

## :star: New Features

- `ModuleDetectionStrategies.EXPLICITLY_ANNOTATED` should consider jMolecules' `@Module` annotation, too [#188](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/188)

## :lady_beetle: Bug Fixes

- `Documenter` fails to apply styles in `applyBackgroundColor(…)` [#196](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/196)

## :hammer: Dependency Upgrades

- Upgrade to Spring Boot 2.5.5 [#197](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/197)
- Upgrade to Spring Boot 2.5.4 [#192](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/192)
- Render C4 model component diagrams via new Structurizr exporter API [#170](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/170)

## :hammer: Dependency Upgrades

- Upgrade to jMolecules 2021.1.0 [#191](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/191)
- Upgrade to ArchUnit 0.21 [#190](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/190)

name: 1.2 M1
body:
## :star: New Features

- Support for C4 model component diagrams [#187](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/187)
- Remove deprecated `@Event` [#184](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/184)
- Remove support for jDDD [#182](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/182)

## :hammer: Dependency Upgrades

- Switch to jMolecules BOM [#183](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/183)
- Upgrade to Spring Boot 2.5.2 [#181](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/181)

## :lady_beetle: Bug Fixes

- Moduliths Events JPA module not working properly when used with Spring Boot DevTools [#171](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/171)

## :hammer: Dependency Upgrades

- Upgrade to Spring Boot 2.3.12 [#179](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/179)
- Upgrade to jMolecules integrations 0.4 [#178](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/178)
- Upgrade to ArchUnit 0.19 [#177](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/177)
- Upgrade transactional event support to Spring 5.3.8 [#176](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/176)
- Upgrade to Spring Boot 2.3.11 [#175](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/175)
- Upgrade to jMolecules Integrations 0.3 [#169](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/169)
- Upgrade to Spring Boot 2.3.10 [#168](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/168)
- Upgrade to ArchUnit 0.18 [#167](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/167)

Release announcement to be found [here](http://odrotbohm.de/2021/07/moduliths-1.1-released/).

name: 1.1 RC2
body:
## :lady_beetle: Bug Fixes

- Support for Spring Boot 2.4 scanning limitations incomplete [#164](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/164)

name: 1.1 RC1
body:
## :star: New Features

- Support for jMolecules Repository interface [#163](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/163)
- Add an `Automatic-Module-Name` in the jar(s) MANIFEST [#161](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/161)
- Add support for jMolecules' `@DomainEventHandler` [#159](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/159)
- Assure Spring Boot 2.4 compatibility [#153](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/153)
- Issues using the `ModuleDetection` SPI [#147](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/147)
- Detect interface based event listeners [#145](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/145)
- Include documentation from event listener methods in module canvas [#143](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/143)
- Upgrade events module to Spring Framework 5.3.2 [#142](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/142)

## :lady_beetle: Bug Fixes

- `NullPointerException` in `Asciidoctor.toOptionalLink(…)` [#154](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/154)
- Documenter fails when using functional endpoints (i.e. `RouterFunction` beans) [#146](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/146)

## :hammer: Dependency Upgrades

- Upgrade to jMolecules 1.2 [#162](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/162)
- Upgrade to jMolecules 1.1 [#158](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/158)
- Switch to jMolecules integrations artifact [#157](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/157)
- Upgrade to ArchUnit 0.17 [#156](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/156)
- Upgrade to Spring Boot 2.3.9 [#155](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/155)
- Upgrade to Spring Boot 2.3.8 [#150](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/150)
- Upgrade to ArchUnit 0.16 [#148](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/148)
- Upgrade to ArchUnit 0.15 [#144](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/144)

name: 1.1 M1
body:
## :star: New Features

- Avoid dollar signs in names of nested classes in generated docs [#140](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/140)
- Document origins of events for published events [#139](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/139)
- Provide a way to use a different module recognition strategy [#137](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/137)
- Module canvas should list reference types for e.g. event listeners [#132](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/132)
- Allow creating a `Modules` instance from a plain package [#131](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/131)
- Allow grouping of Spring components in module canvas [#130](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/130)
- Integration with jMolecules (superseding jDDD) [#127](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/127)
- Add `TypedPublishedEvents.matchingMapped(…)` [#126](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/126)
- Allow creation of `PublishedEvents` from Spring Data aggregates [#125](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/125)
- Allow programmatic creation of `PublishedEvents` [#124](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/124)
- Integrate event publication log, formerly known as Spring Domain Events [#121](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/issues/121)

## :lady_beetle: Bug Fixes

- Avoid StackOverflow in `ModuleDetectionStrategy.explictlyAnnotated()` [#138](https://github.com/odrotbohm/moduliths/pull/138)

## :heart: Contributors

We'd like to thank all the contributors who worked on this release!

- [@OLibutzki](https://github.com/OLibutzki)
- [@florianmaier101178](https://github.com/florianmaier101178)
- [@mschieder](https://github.com/mschieder)
